name: Space Jailbreak
description:
This is my part for the "Metroidvana Jam Month 8". A simple  2D Action-Platformer with 8 bit and NES style graphics! 

Captain Gavin Menos was captured by an unknown enemy. Now he has to flee from the Space Jail. Can you help him?

CONTROLLS

A D - move left and right

K - jump and boost up

SPACE - shoot

L - glide

ENTER - Show map
